channel.title: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?"

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded: My makeshift pistol looped, however I have read that all items made with a silver/cobalt shaft or a steel tile will loop. I don't know if this might have affected the pistol looping or not. And of course all boots and cowls loop.

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded: I know that the best one loop. All the ones with wasteland in there name. Silver scythe also loops apparently. I am not sure if any pistols loop other then the wasteland pistol, which does loop. Desert shades loop.

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded: Not exactly the same question, but I figured I'd ask. Do the wasteland permanents loop? I'm almost finished with the wasteland stuff, but I was going to go back and get the best I could (waaaaah runes not being available till next season). Figured that would be rather pointless if they don't loop.

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded:
Woah there, trigger. Put those pea-shooters down!

I'm not in wastelands (whoops… started it yesterday. Guess I am in Wastelands… but I don't have guns yet), so I can't confirm this. Anything you find out would be nice to know.

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded: I need more guns then! +2, +3, +4, +4 levels when bingoing = +13 levels. With risky badge, that's 23. 69 more damage with Doughman o_O

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded:
I know at least one person reported that the guns stack… a makeshift and a regular specifically (and brought to mind dual-wielding pistols). This may be a bug, however.

I know that cloaks, boots, cowls and scythes don't stack. Empirical testing and all that. Can't say for shades.

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded: Wasteland items do not stack. You can have multiple if you just want to pump up your perm item count, but otherwise the best in category will be the only one that counts (ie, if you have a Repeating Pistol, a Wasteland Pistol, and a Makeshift Pistol, you'll only get the effects of the Repeating pistol, but they count as 3 items for your perm item count on your player look up).

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded: Actually, wasteland items that are not runic items DO NOT stack. Today I made wasteland duskcloak and already had basic duskcloak. If they stacked I would only lose 8 stamina per mission, I really lose 10. Runic items may stack, but I doubt it - and I don't see how they'd affect 11DBHK's shades at all.

item.title: Re: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded:
Wastland disease stamina loss is reduced by items.

More types of Dustcloak you have less disease takes from you.

Also with only best items looping I don't see why should rest not stack.

item.title: Do Wastelands Permenents Stack?
item.content:encoded:
I've heard conflicting reports, so I've decided to ask here.

Do, for example, Solid Shades stack with Desert Shades?

Do they both stack with 11DBHK's Purple Shades?

Also, a related question: Do Twin Bee Pistols count for the Field Trip Special Mission?
